body.p: The Board noted that the scope of IFRS 1 focuses on whether an entity’s financial statements are its first IFRS financial statements (a term defined in Appendix A). If an entity’s financial statements meet the definition of ‘first IFRS financial statements’, the entity is required to apply IFRS 1 in accordance with paragraph 2(a). However, use of the term ‘first’ raises the question whether IFRS 1 can be applied more than once.
